attributes.action: More Money into the NHS instead of making cuts to hide that you want it private.
attributes.additional_details: Within all of our local communities somewhere in the last 5 years we will have all had some sort of NHS funded hospital etc. Close down. These centres range from walkin centres, minor injury departments and accident and emergency departments. The demand within the last 2 years has grown massively and no more money has been put aside for the NHS, the government think that with this increase in demand the NHS can keep running on the same money as it did 5 years ago.
attributes.background: The Government are still wanting to save money within the NHS, the demand on the NHS is growing massively but the funding is decreasing. The NHS is an amazing thing but if these cuts in funding keep happening the NHS will be gone for ever. SAVE OUR NHS
